column4: hiya, does anyone know if theres a workaround to get ubuntu (or linux in general) to work with an 8800 graphics card yet?
not as far as i can see

on ubuntu i dont get any options for that kind of thing, i also tryed out elive (which has the exsact same problem of just no output atall on the screen) and that had various options to pick different drivers, none of them made any difference
the nvidia driver isn't opensource, so it needs a seperate step to enable it
